" Apple" Malus " Apples are a type of fruit, or fruit produced from the apple tree." " Chery" Prunus subg. Cerasus Cherries are a plant subgenus of Prunus, characterized by having small, compound corymbs flowers, and having smooth fruit with only a weak groove on one side, or no furrow. " Kiwi" Actinidia deliciosa Kiwi or Chinese Gooseberry is the name given to the edible berries of several types of woody vines in the genus Actinidia. Pear Pyrus The fruit which has the Latin name Pyrus communis is a fruit plant from the genus Pyrus that produces fresh fruit when eaten because it contains a lot of water, with a gritty and sweet texture.
